title: Abhijit Banerjee | Biography & Facts | Britannica Money

quotes: Abhijit Banerjee (born February 21, 1961, Mumbai, India) is an Indian-born American economist
Banerjee studied economics at the University of Calcutta (B.Sc. 1981), Jawaharlal Nehru University (M.A. 1983), and Harvard University (Ph.D. 1988)

He taught economics at Princeton University from 1988 to 1992
(From left) 2019 Nobel laureates in Economic Sciences Michael Kremer, Esther Duflo, and Abhijit Banerjee at a press conference at the Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences, Stockholm, December 7, 2019
